inclusion.criterion: evaluated in the Emergency Department for loss of consciousness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: identification of cause of loss of consciousness after initial evaluation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: loss of consciousness classified as high risk syncope
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient was admitted for evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias. He has a history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, and ventricular tachycardia.
